languages.text: "Надеюсь, Администратум извлечет урок из произошедшего и позаботится, чтобы на Даргонусе больше не появлялось таких опасных карьеристов, как Вультур".
languages.translation_comment: Finished the showdown with the prefect at the Palace of Justice.

traits.locale_text: Надеюсь, Администратум извлечет урок из произошедшего и позаботится, чтобы на Даргонусе больше не появлялось таких опасных карьеристов, как Вультур".

languages.text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
languages.translation_comment: Finished the showdown with the prefect at the Palace of Justice.
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, Администратум извлечет урок из произошедшего и позаботится, чтобы на Даргонусе больше не появлялось таких опасных карьеристов, как Вультур".

traits.locale_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
"I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
"I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
"I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
"I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
"I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

languages.text: 「帝国行政局が今回の出来事から教訓を得て、ヴァルターのような危険な野心家が二度とダルゴナスに現れないようにしてくれることを祈ります」
languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国行政局が今回の出来事から教訓を得て、ヴァルターのような危険な野心家が二度とダルゴナスに現れないようにしてくれることを祈ります」

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, das Administratum lernt aus diesen Ereignissen und stellt sicher, dass Dargonus in Zukunft keine so gefährlichen Karrieristen wie Vultur mehr erlebt."
languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, das Administratum lernt aus diesen Ereignissen und stellt sicher, dass Dargonus in Zukunft keine so gefährlichen Karrieristen wie Vultur mehr erlebt."

languages.text: « J'espère que l'Administratum saura tirer la leçon de ces événements et veillera à ce qu'il n'y ait plus jamais de dangereux carriéristes comme Vultur sur Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que l'Administratum saura tirer la leçon de ces événements et veillera à ce qu'il n'y ait plus jamais de dangereux carriéristes comme Vultur sur Dargonus. »

languages.text: «Confío en que el Administratum aprenda de lo sucedido y se asegure de que Dargonus esté libre de arribistas tan peligrosos como Vultur».
languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

traits.locale_text: «Confío en que el Administratum aprenda de lo sucedido y se asegure de que Dargonus esté libre de arribistas tan peligrosos como Vultur».

languages.text: “我希望帝国内政部能从这些事情中吸取教训，确保达戈努斯不会再出现沃尔图尔这样危险的野心家。”
languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

traits.locale_text: “我希望帝国内政部能从这些事情中吸取教训，确保达戈努斯不会再出现沃尔图尔这样危险的野心家。”

languages.text: "Umarım Administratum tüm bu olanlardan dersini alır da Dargonus, bir daha Vultur gibi tehlikeli birine denk gelmez."
languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım Administratum tüm bu olanlardan dersini alır da Dargonus, bir daha Vultur gibi tehlikeli birine denk gelmez."

languages.original_text: "I hope the Administratum learns from these events and ensures that Dargonus sees no more of such dangerous careerists as Vultur."
